RNS Announcement: New Subscription Agreement Signed

The Smarter Web Company, a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that a New Subscription Agreement has been signed for a further 50 million new Ordinary Shares.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8

RNS Announcement: GM & Investor Presentation

The Smarter Web Company, a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that it will be holding a live in-person presentation to investors at today’s General Meeting of the Company (“General Meeting”) to be held at John James Theatre, Aerospace Bristol, Hayes Way, Patchway, Bristol, BS34 5BZ at 11.00 a.m.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

RNS Announcement: Result of General Meeting

The Smarter Web Company, a London-listed technology company and the UK's largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that at the General Meeting of the Company (“General Meeting”) held today, both resolutions set out in the Notice of General Meeting were passed on a poll.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

text:
RNS Announcement: Subscription Agreement Update

The Smarter Web Company, a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that no Ordinary Shares were sold by Shard Merchant Capital Ltd, the Company’s counter party in the Subscription Agreement announced on 04 September 2025, during the preceding two-week period (the “Subscription Shares”). The Subscription Agreement allows Shard Merchant Capital Ltd to sell new Ordinary Shares via its broker.

The Company notes that, going forward, it will provide weekly updates in respect of any Subscription Shares sold pursuant to the Subscription Agreement only in circumstances where Subscription Shares have been sold during the prior week.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
RNS Announcement: Subscription Agreement Update - No Shares Placed

The Smarter Web Company, a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that no Ordinary Shares were placed during the preceding two-week period under the terms of the Subscription Agreement announced on 04 September 2025 (the “Subscription Shares”).

As no Subscription Shares were sold during the period, no gross proceeds were generated, and the balance of Ordinary Shares available to be placed pursuant to the Subscription Agreement remains at 13,240,500.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time
